title: Group portrait of Junior Mothers club members wearing matching plaid skirts and light colored sleeveless blouses, squatting: Alma Speed Fox, Betty Tibbs, Jean Pendleton, Betty Watkins, Norma Malone, and Phyllis Pitts; and standing includes: Mildred Britton, Bessie Paxton, Evelyn Anderson, June Stokes, Vivian Kizsie, Claudell Mull, Dolores McCoy Taylor, Frances Bell Nunn and Fredericka Fulwylie, posed in front of light colored clapboard building, at Luvola's Farm, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
